root.text:
Can’t stop complaining about lecture, actually it is an easy task. why don’t you take the stage for a while?

Be a teacher and inspire the students to learn in a way they love to.

text: It is an on-stage individual event.
Topics will be given on the spot.
Preparation time for the lecture -10 mins.
Participants are expected to adhere to the timings.
All the registered participants will be given a technical topic.
The total time of the lecture is restricted to 10 mins (5 to 7 mins for lecture and 2 to 3mins for viva).
